#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t,i;
	cin>>t;
	int count2,count3,count5,n;
	while(t--)
	{
		count2=count3=count5=0;
		
		cin>>n;
		
		i = 2;
		
		while(i<=n)
		{
			count2+=n/i;
			i*=2;
		}
		
		i = 3;
		
		while(i<=n)
		{
			count3+=n/i;
			i*=3;
		}
		
		i = 5;
		
		while(i<=n)
		{
			count5+=n/i;
			i*=5;
		}
		cout<<count2<<"\n"<<count3<<"\n"<<count5<<"\n";
	}
	
	return 0;
}
